name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.client.block.write.locateFollowingBlock.max.delay.ms
description: The maximum delay (unit is ms) before retrying locateFollowingBlock.

name: hadoop.security.crypto.buffer.size
description: The buffer size used by CryptoInputStream and CryptoOutputStream.

name: mapreduce.ifile.readahead.bytes
description: Configuration key to set the IFile readahead length in bytes.

name: dfs.client.deadnode.detection.probe.deadnode.threads
description: The maximum number of threads to use for probing dead node.

name: dfs.namenode.decommission.backoff.monitor.pending.blocks.per.lock
description:
When loading blocks into the replication queue, release the namenode write
    lock after the defined number of blocks have been processed.

name: mapreduce.job.max.split.locations
description:
The max number of block locations to store for each split for
    locality calculation.

name: dfs.client.datanode-restart.timeout
description:
Expert only. The time to wait, in seconds, from reception of an
    datanode shutdown notification for quick restart, until declaring
    the datanode dead and invoking the normal recovery mechanisms.
    The notification is sent by a datanode when it is being shutdown
    using the shutdownDatanode admin command with the upgrade option.
    Support multiple time unit suffix(case insensitive), as described
    in dfs.heartbeat.interval.If no time unit is specified then seconds
    is assumed.
